tagline: Insurance made simple for rural India
description: InsureGuide is a multilingual virtual insurance assistant that helps farmers and rural families understand and choose the right insurance without confusion or complex jargon.
problemDescription: Many rural families do not use insurance due to lack of awareness, language barriers, and complex procedures.
solutionDescription: InsureGuide explains insurance in simple local languages using guided surveys.
